9.1.20  3:43 am   Why is there an apple AND a pineapple even though the 2  aren't related?

     apple just means fruit. the reason the apple gets to be called apple is because it was the first fruit anyone thought of

     Also how did we discover popcorn?

     i don't know how you discovered it but i discovered it by going to the cinema

      impossible

      how about talking to the car instead. set up a little role play

      pretty good

      never heard of it

      sort of

9.1.20  12:14 am   I'm learning to play the flute. Any tips?

      yes but only if you can tell me where you may be having trouble. and if you are not having any trouble, then, no tips





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

8.31.20  11:48 pm   gonna make a fantasy novels. any ideas?

      no advice if you haven't started yet. let me know how it goes and i will try to help if you run into any problems

8.31.20  11:46 pm   What's your favorite type of art other than music?

      video

8.31.20  11:21 pm   do you ever listen to your older music?

     it's very scary but yes, sometimes

     And if so, do you still feel that it's on par quality wise with your current stuff?

      never did

8.31.20  10:54 pm   In the song slow down with the graph and the lyrics going down left and when it says down and it goes down was that on purpose or was it because you had no more space

      i had to check the video to find what you mean, but i found it, i suppose it makes for a more decisive ending to the line. and the box that appears around it supports this. it feels like we're arriving at a destination

8.31.20  10:28 pm   what is your favorite word?

      polk

8.31.20  10:09 pm   i would buy a book of your poetry, please consider

      you can read it for free on the computer, or even on your phone which is like a modern day version of a book

8.31.20  9:54 pm   are you do the stupid?

      it's on my to do list

8.31.20  9:50 pm   i have learned to hate you in the most loving way imaginable and ever since my creative path has become more and more my own.

      that makes sense

8.31.20  9:38 pm   how is thing making going?

      ok

8.31.20  9:20 pm   Why does everyone think you don't use capital letters?

      they must have never watched any of my videos or read any of my writing

8.31.20  8:59 pm   How do you get rid of a cursed doll?

      bless it

      i have the opposite problem, i have to try to make the videos fast enough that i don't drown from too much inspiration

8.31.20  8:36 pm   Do I need a scarf to keep my head on my body?

      you're gonna need something a lot more powerful

      everything. there is time

      yes

8.31.20  6:27 pm   I like a girl, i should tell her?

      if you tell anyone else first then it's too late

8.31.20  6:15 pm   is it normal to have free and easy superpowers?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.31.20  5:06 pm   Have you ever considered doing live performances?

      yes

8.31.20  5:00 pm   i'm new here :) do people repeat questions a lot?

      never

8.31.20  4:47 pm   what is the company policy you speak of

      which one

8.31.20  4:29 pm   Do you ever feel like trying to make something good gets in the way of trying to make something genuine?

     no

      How do you make sure to stay true to yourself?

     it's usually the same way i avoid stepping on hot lava, which is that i have a map of all the hot lava

     I feel like all of your work is incredibly genuine while also being super good, and in my own work I get caught up trying make something other people will like.

      if you make something that you don't like but other people do, that has to be a huge coincidence. it would be like painting with a color you can't see

8.31.20  4:05 pm   can you confirm that Ohio doesnt actually exist

      no

      normal

      try using it in real life

      sure

8.31.20  2:18 pm   How do I know if my friends actually want to be friends with me

      how do you know you actually want to be friends with them

8.31.20  2:03 pm   What is a question?

      never heard of it

8.31.20  1:47 pm   is there even any point to trying to "get good" at something in the first place?

     sure

     its so easy to look at something amazing and think "i wanna do that" but it feels more and more like this is like sending yourself into an infinite maze with no exit, because nobody has ever set out to learn a skill with the sole motivation of "getting good" at it, and then been satisfied once they reached a certain level of ability. i feel like its much better to just relax and try to have fun with what you can do in the moment, and let growth happen naturally. do you agree?

      getting good at something might be necessary in order to do that thing. but most of the time you will start before you are as good as you can be. and in most cases there is not really much limit on how good you can get

8.31.20  12:32 pm   What are you getting me for Christmas?

      a new year

8.31.20  12:27 pm   tips for school anxiety? :(

      teach

8.31.20  12:14 pm   Are tubes (like pipe-lines) holes?

     no, the space in the middle is the hole

     If so, would that mean that all humans and animals are holes?

     no

     Also how is a black hole a "hole", wouldn't it be a black ball?

     yes

     Unless the black hole is secretly a tube, right?! So by that defintion, going into a black hole meams that you'll end up on the other side of the tube, so does that mean the black hole is a tube to somewhere else, and that nothing disappears, but simply enters another dimention we can't comprehend?

     right but it's not a tube

     Is this getting too philosophical?

     that depends on the local regulations in your area

8.31.20  12:08 pm   what are some of your other hobbies besides music?

      making videos to go with the music, or sometimes videos for music to go with

     you're not necessarily supposed to know you like music. music often works most powerfully in covert ways

      you could maybe barf some of it
